nl.tudelft.dnainator.javafx.widgets.dialogs

Class ExceptionDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.control.Dialog<javafx.scene.control.ButtonType>
      • javafx.scene.control.Alert
        • nl.tudelft.dnainator.javafx.widgets.dialogs.ExceptionDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class ExceptionDialog
extends javafx.scene.control.Alert
    Provides a dialog to inform the user that an exception has occurred.

    Based on code from a tutorial found here: http://code.makery.ch/blog/javafx-dialogs-official/

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExceptionDialog

        public ExceptionDialog(javafx.scene.Node parent,
                       Throwable throwable,
                       String title)
        Instantiates a new ExceptionDialog.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent {link Node} of this dialog, to have it behave as a modal dialog. In case of null, the dialog is not modal.
        throwable - Throwable for which this dialog is created.
        title - Title of this dialog.
